gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Raptors 118, Bulls 107
gameRecap.excerpt: The Raptors defeat the Bulls, 118-107. Gary Trent Jr. recorded 24 points, five rebounds and six 3PM for the Raptors, while DeMar DeRozan led all scorers with 25 points, five assists, three steals and four blocks for the Bulls in the losing effort. The Raptors improve to 17-30 on the season, while the Bulls fall to 22-26.
